employees.notes: Proff lists 66 employees for the main legal entity (AS) in the company profile/offical information section [1].

revenue.notes: Operating revenue is shown as 192,413 with "Beløp i 1000" and NOK currency, converted here to NOK 192,413,000 [1].

company.entity_resolution_notes: The selected entity is the Norwegian AS "ANLEGGSERVICE ØST AS" with org number 876 898 462 on Proff; this page also links the company homepage [1].

srm_assessment.overall_summary: Reviewed company service pages and the 2024 due-diligence report do not document concrete inbound use of recycled/recovered/waste-derived materials as production inputs. One page explicitly describes old asphalt being sent to approved disposal (outflow), which is excluded from SRM input accounting [2][3].
gaps_and_uncertainties: No quantified inbound SRM inputs (mass/volume/energy or share) were disclosed in the reviewed public materials [2][3].
Supplier categories are listed (e.g., asphalt, stone/pukk/jord), but recycled-content share or waste-derived feedstock use is not specified [3].

evidence.claim: Describes outbound disposal of old asphalt, not inbound SRM input.
Company reports asphalt supplier category but not recycled input content.
Company reports mineral supplier category without SRM specification.
